languages.text: "Верно, дочь. Ты... чувствуешь, как должно быть переданной ноше сией?"
"That is correct, my daughter. Can you feel it? The proper way this burden must be passed?"
languages.original_text: "Верно, дочь. Ты... чувствуешь, как должно быть переданной ноше сией?"

traits.locale_text: "That is correct, my daughter. Can you... feel the proper way for this burden to be handed over?"
"That is correct, my daughter. Can you... feel the proper way for this burden to be handed over?"
"That is correct, my daughter. Can you feel it? The proper way this burden must be passed?"
"That is correct, my daughter. Can you feel it? The proper way this burden must be passed?"
"That is correct, my daughter. Can you feel it? The proper way this burden must be passed?"
"That is correct, my daughter. Can you feel it? The proper way this burden must be passed?"

languages.text: « C'est exact, ma fille. Le sentez-vous ? Devinez-vous la seule manière appropriée de transmettre un tel fardeau ? »
languages.original_text: "That is correct, my daughter. Can you feel it? The proper way this burden must be passed?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est exact, ma fille. Le sentez-vous ? Devinez-vous la seule manière appropriée de transmettre un tel fardeau ? »

languages.text: «Así es, hija mía. ¿Lo sientes? ¿La forma correcta de lidiar con esta carga?».
languages.original_text: "That is correct, my daughter. Can you feel it? The proper way this burden must be passed?"

traits.locale_text: «Así es, hija mía. ¿Lo sientes? ¿La forma correcta de lidiar con esta carga?».

languages.text: 「その通りだ、娘よ。感じるか？この重責は正しい方法で受け継ぐべきだろう？」
languages.original_text: "That is correct, my daughter. Can you feel it? The proper way this burden must be passed?"

traits.locale_text: 「その通りだ、娘よ。感じるか？この重責は正しい方法で受け継ぐべきだろう？」

languages.text: “确实如此，我的女儿。负担需要通过正确的方式代代相传，你能感觉得到吗？”
languages.original_text: "That is correct, my daughter. Can you feel it? The proper way this burden must be passed?"

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，我的女儿。负担需要通过正确的方式代代相传，你能感觉得到吗？”

languages.text: "Das ist korrekt, meine Tochter. Spürt Ihr es? Spürt Ihr, wie diese Last auf die richtige Weise weitergegeben werden muss?"
languages.original_text: "That is correct, my daughter. Can you feel it? The proper way this burden must be passed?"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist korrekt, meine Tochter. Spürt Ihr es? Spürt Ihr, wie diese Last auf die richtige Weise weitergegeben werden muss?"

languages.text: "Bu doğru kızım. Bu yükün münasip şekilde nasıl aktarılacağını hissedebiliyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "That is correct, my daughter. Can you feel it? The proper way this burden must be passed?"
